Leaves: Compound of opposite leaflets up to 30 cm long with a single leaflet at the end. With roughly serrated margins.
Flowers: Red or reddish-orange, trumpet shaped, up to 9 cm across.
FruitSeeds: Dry pod up to 20 cm long, containing numerous winged seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Difficult to distinguish from Madame Galen hybrid (*Campsis x tagliabuana*).
